chat_history.message:
Dear Backcare,

Our logistics partner is seeking the customer's email address. Could you kindly please send it? Thank you. 

Regards,
Yi Ling

Dear ecomobile

the customer's email: rust.achim@t-online.de

Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for providing us the customer's email address. We will update our logistics partner. Thank you.

Regards,
YL

Dear Backcare,

Kindly note that we have updated the email address.
Thank you.

Regards,
KW

Dear ecomobile

They have opened an investigation, then they refund the customer or send a new device 

Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team

Hello, 
My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem: 
Good day, my order number 40812118 has not been delivered yet. UPS Tracking Number 1ZBF1560D901136133 , I would like to request information or re-delivery or a refund of the purchase amount. Thank you very much, Achim Rust
Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner and are awaiting their response. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
YL

Dear Backcare,

We extend our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience caused. It has come to our attention that the parcel may have been stolen. We take such incidents very seriously and have launched an extensive internal inquiry to ascertain the circumstances surrounding this unfortunate event. As a gesture of our commitment to customer satisfaction and to alleviate any inconvenience caused, we have promptly refunded the customer in full for their order.

Regards,
RK
